item.title: Introducing the PowerShell GitLab Utility Module
item.description: Introduction Harnessing GitLab with PowerShell: Introducing the PowerShell.GitLab.Utility Module In the evolving landscape of DevOps and CI/CD, automating and streamlining operations is invaluable. GitLab, a web-based DevOps lifecycle tool, provides a comprehensive platform for software development, from project planning and source code management to CI/CD, monitoring, and security. To enhance the interaction with GitLab through automation, the PowerShell.GitLab.Utility modules have emerged as a significant advancement. What is PowerShell.GitLab.Utility? PowerShell.GitLab.Utility is a PowerShell module designed to interface with GitLab.
